Administration.text:
Type:
Antifungal
, particularly used for
aspergillosis
and
candidiasis
Dosage Forms: powder for injection
Dosage Strengths: 50mg/vial, 70mg/vial
Routes of Administration: IV
Common Trade Names: Cancidas

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: C
Lactation risk
: Infant risk cannot be ruled out

Serious.text:
Erythema multiforme
,
Stevens-Johnson syndrome
Pancreatitis
,
hepatic failure
Sepsis
Nephrotoxicity
Pleural effusion
, respiratory distress
Angioedema

Hypotension
Rash
Diarrhea

Abnormal

Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: 13-15 hours
Metabolism: spontaneous degradation, hydrolysis and N-acetylation
Excretion: Fecal, renal

Mechanism_of_Action.text: Inhibits beta (1,3)-D-glucan synthesis in fungal cell wall
